title: MY LAUNCH BUTTON DOESN'T WORK!!!
body:
Today I updated my client as usual, after I updated it, the "LAUNCH" doesn't seem to work.
After I clicked it, it turns grey and turns back to orange and it just repeats itself whenever I click "LAUNCH".
**HELP ASAP!**

-Sora8844

replies.body:
Can you try launching League from the **LeagueClient.exe** file inside your league directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) to see if you can login that way?

Let me know if this works!

Hey idk if anyones up rn prbly not but i am actually suffering from the exact same problem and yea i tried that and it didnt work. I noticed that every time i tried itthe lockfile created a duplicate file idk if its supposed to do that. I tried opening the old client and it opens but pressing launch does nothing andi downloaded the updated one too. I tried repairing it to no luck help rito like i live in bakerfield i can be in santa monica in like 3 hours fam plz

Since you're still experiencing issues after launching from the specific exe I mentioned, I believe this is likely related to a poor connection to our servers. The moment you hit the launch button, your client attempts to connect to our login servers, so when this fails, it's usually because your computer cannot reach those servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) since it is very likely to resolve this issue entirely.

Let me know if this helped!

This is likely something we'll need to dive into system logs to resolve. I recommend running a set of logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will be happy to assist you further with this.

Let me know if this you have issues with your ticket submission.

Thanks
And the logs are unzipped for some reason
I think I have no problem with the support ticket thing
Once again, thanks
